original: Andersson, Kurt Heige, stadsfogde, Västervik, f. 23/10/06 i Malmö av grossh. Helge A. o. Karin Andersson. G. 46 m. Agnes Persson. — Jur. kand. i Lund 35. Stud :res. t. Frankr. 27. E. not. v. Sthlms rådh:rätt 35-36, tingstjg. i Ingelstads o. Järrestads samt Södra Åsbo o. Bjäre doms. 37-40, tf. rådm. i Kristianstad tidv. 40, 41 o. 42, tf. rådm. i Karlskrona 41, drätselsekr. i Karlskrona 41, tf. stads-omb :man i Kalmar 42-43, tf. rådm. i Kalmar samt sekr. i byggn:ndn o. häl’Sov:ndn där 43-45, .stadsfogde sed. 45.
translated: Andersson, Kurt Heige, city magistrate, Västervik, born October 23, 1906 in Malmö to entrepreneur Helge A. and Karin Andersson. Married to Agnes Persson since 1946. Obtained a law degree from Lund University in 1935. Studied abroad in France in 1927. Served as a notary public at Stockholm City Court from 1935-1936. Served as a court clerk in Ingelstad, Järrestad, Södra Åsbo, and Bjäre 1937-1940. Temporarily served as a councilor in Kristianstad in 1940, 41, and 42, as well as in Karlskrona in 1941. Became a city treasurer in Karlskrona in 1941, and served temporarily as a city official in Kalmar 1942-43 and councilor as well as secretary of the building and health boards there from 1943-1945. Appointed city magistrate of Västervik in 1945.
